TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_u_nu_binacadan_a_kamu_nu_kitakit_ayza_a_demiad, title = u_nu_binacadan_a_kamu_nu_kitakit_ayza_a_demiad, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_nu_binacadan_a_kamu_nu_kitakit_ayza_a_demiad} }

S.FORM: u nu binacadan a kamu nu kitakit ayza a demiad (kamu nu Hulam: 世界母語日) cacay alasubu izaw ku walu a mihecaan,tusa a bulad tusa abataan izaw ku cavay ayza u nu binacadan a kamu nu kitaki ayza a demiad, kanca a musakamu tu nu uzipay nu binacadan a kamu pabalucu'an sapacayca i kitaki mi pakatineng a midama tu kamu apacakat tu kamu nu binacadan pangiha' tu mahiniay, sakasa i tint kitakitay, a mami tu malawpes tu kamu nu binacadan. ayza musakamu kaku tu kamu nu Sakizaya

o no binacadan a kamo no kitakit ayza a demiad (kamo no Holam: 世界母語日) cacay alasobo izaw ko walo a mihecaan,tosa a bolad tosa abataan izaw ko cavay ayza o no binacadan a kamo no kitaki ayza a demiad, kanca a mosakamo to no ozipay no binacadan a kamo pabaloco'an sapacayca i kitaki mi pakatineng a midama to kamo apacakat to kamo no binacadan pangiha' to mahiniay, sakasa i tint kitakitay, a mami to malawpes to kamo no binacadan. ayza mosakamo kako to kamo no Sakizaya
